column4: Can I tell the system that I don't want to update a particular component -- and to STOP BUGGING ME ABOUT IT?
I downgraded one package (using synaptic), but now Update Manager keeps offering to upgrade it for me!
what is it?  Why don't you want to upgrade it?
wine 1.1.12 breaks things on my machine, so I'm pinning to 1.1.11
so then you know how to pin now?
actually (on the linked page), the simple answer is Synaptic -> Package -> Lock Version !
I'm just trying to figure out how important the /dev/sda6 volume is
I meant " pastebin your /var/log/Xorg.0.log" for you, but if you have an X problem you should do that too jeromel
hadn't heard of htop.  Looks interesting
